characters.name: Spider-Man
characters.description: Agile and fearless Spider-Man – a popular and well-known superhero, a role model for all children who aspire to be like him.

characters.name: Pirates
characters.description: Pirates who will organize a real sea adventure and treasure hunt!

characters.name: Hunter and Dinosaur
characters.description: An educational and entertaining program with quest elements. Children will search for clues, each leading to exciting tasks. The goal is to solve all the riddles and bring a real Dinosaur to life!

characters.name: Snow White
characters.description: The kind and endlessly welcoming heroine from the Disney animated film.

characters.name: Bunny
characters.description: Our bunny hopped through the magical forest and accidentally came to the kids' party. Now, together with the children, he will embark on a truly amazing journey.

characters.name: Transformer Bumblebee
characters.description: Bumblebee – one of the bravest and most agile Autobots. This Transformer has many human qualities. He loves to smile, sing, and dance.

characters.name: Chase (Paw Patrol)
characters.description: With Chase, kids can become brave heroes of the rescue team and overcome many obstacles while playing.

characters.name: Winged Unicorn
characters.description: Winged unicorns live in a magical land. They bring happiness and can fulfill the most cherished wishes.

characters.name: Fixies
characters.description: Fixies Simka and Nolik and Shpulya will delight your little one with incredible adventures. And who are the Fixies? A Big-Big Secret?? Not at all!

characters.name: Safari
characters.description: An educational and entertaining program with quest elements, where children solve riddles to bring a real dinosaur to life!

characters.name: Elsa
characters.description: Elsa – the Queen of Arendelle, born with the gift of creating snow and ice, will keep your child entertained.

characters.name: Pirate
characters.description: Together with the Pirate, party guests will set off on a pirate adventure and go through many trials.

characters.name: Superman
characters.description: The animator Superman will guide the kids through a superhero school, helping them tackle villains.

characters.name: Squid Game
characters.description: Inspired by the series, we have prepared an outdoor quest ‘Squid Game’ and a corresponding animation program.

characters.name: Mini Mouse
characters.description: Everyone's favorite — mischievous Minnie. She's been known to everyone for over half a century!

characters.name: Caramel
characters.description: Caramel – a brave, energetic, and cheerful heroine who will entertain anyone at a children's party.

characters.name: Iron Man
characters.description: Iron Man is assembling new Avengers and preparing to save the world from villains.

characters.name: Kukutikis
characters.description: The cute and kind Kukutikis characters will fill the children's party with cheerful songs.

characters.name: Ladybug
characters.description: The cheerful and brave Marinette, known as Ladybug, is already hurrying to the party!

characters.name: LOL Doll
characters.description: The bright, striking, and cheerful LOL doll – a modern beloved animation character.

characters.name: Ninja Turtle
characters.description: Together with the turtle Michelangelo, guests will take part in an unusual game program.

characters.name: Pink Unicorn
characters.description: A Unicorn-themed Birthday – a celebration wrapped in kind magic and fairy-tale adventures.

characters.name: TikTok
characters.description: Together we will create a TikTok House! Participants will enjoy challenges, games, and dances!

characters.name: Super Woman
characters.description: Super Woman – Superman’s loyal companion, a strong and cheerful heroine.

characters.name: Teddy Bear
characters.description: The cuddliest character – a cute and cheerful teddy bear that will leave no one indifferent.

characters.name: Wednesday
characters.description: The mysterious girl from the Addams family. Possesses psychic abilities that make her even more intriguing and mysterious.

characters.name: Unicorn
characters.description: The Unicorn will create a festive atmosphere and will not leave anyone indifferent at your party.

characters.name: LOL Unicorn Doll
characters.description: A cute, flashy unicorn doll that has become very popular with girls, allowing them to realize any creative idea with this fashionista.

characters.name: Cinderella
characters.description: The plain stepsister will find a magical crown at your party and transform into a beautiful princess.

characters.name: Fairy
characters.description: A wonderful and magical celebration with a kind and charming Fairy.

characters.name: Pinkie Pie
characters.description: The charming Pinkie Pie is adored for her playful and kind nature, and every child dreams of meeting her in person.

characters.name: Indian
characters.description: Many generations have loved playing Indians. Whole books and movies have been made about how children and even some adults play Indians.

characters.name: Troll Rosy
characters.description: Rosy is well known to every child. The troll with the beautiful name Rosy is the embodiment of a cheerful, funny, kind, and naive girl.
